clericpassive.description: Heal and deal powerful burst damage.
clericpassive.name: cleric

clericw.name: Divine Heal
clericw.description: Heals people around you and gives a moderate speed boost.

clerice.name: Blood Sacrifice
clerice.description: Sacrfice your party's health to get a moderate boost in attack.

clericr.name: Godly Control
clericr.description: Creates a small area where you have no cooldowns and pushes projectiles away.

lancerpassive.description: Methodical offense with powerful edge guarding tools.
lancerpassive.name: lancer

lancerq.name: Space Blade
lancerq.description: Boosts speed and deals low damage. High lifesteal.

lancerw.name: Weakening Meteors
lancerw.description: A spray of meteors that drastically reduce enemy damage output and deal strong damage.

lancere.description: Dash briefly, spawning a chasing projectile. Gives moderate collision immunity.
lancere.name: Galaxy Rift

lancerr.name: Spatial Distorions
lancerr.description: Pull all enemy projctiles in. Gives lots of invincibility.

tankpassive.description: Snipe from afar with powerful set up.
tankpassive.name: tank

tanke.description: Create a sunburst that blocks mosts attacks. Notable knockback.
tanke.name: Protective Strike

tankq.description: A burst of sun that can silence foes. Shortly after, targets are more effected by knockback.
tankq.name: Light Beam

tankr.name: Prism Diffuse
tankr.description: Stop all enemy projectiles in your path! Makes tank projectiles more potent.

tankw.name: Prism Focus
tankw.description: Deals minor burn damage and speeds up tank projectiles, focusing them to where you aim.

tricksterq.description: A close ranged grab. Refreshes saber cooldown.
tricksterq.name: Tricky Grapple

tricksterw.description: Snipe someone and get nearby. Refreshes grapple cooldown.
tricksterw.name: Snipe

trickstere.name: Launcher
trickstere.description: Launch someone away, or parry a projectile.

traitorpassive.description: Rescue those out of the void, only to kill them later.
traitorpassive.name: traitor

traitorq.name: Void Rescue
traitorq.description: Deals no damage. If the opponent is in the void, grab them back and deal moderate damage.

traitore.name: Void Path
traitore.description: Dash, leaving a trail of void.

traitorr.name: Crippling Shot
traitorr.description: Cripples those in the void. Greatly heals. Be careful.

druidw.description: Bloom a large flower, dealing poison damage.
druidw.name: Bloom

druidr.name: Lifebringer
druidr.description: Teleport, leaving life in your wake.

Tips: Druids should aim to control the center. The edge light sources are less useful.
Blood Sacrifice is a large boost in damage, but the self-damage can catch you off guard. Remember to heal!
Light Beam makes the opponent more slippery. Try comboing it into other spells!
Galaxy Rift accelerates. Keep a distance while casting for max knockback!
Grabbing someone can be risky if they're attacking, so try catching them off guard first.
Be careful with crippling shot. It's hard to aim, but you get a lot of reward if they're in the void.
